Script.name: szermierz unik
Script.script:
unik_info = Geyser.Label:new({ name = "unik_info", x = 160, y = 855, width = 45, height = 45, fgColor = "white", message = [[<center>UNIK</center>]], })
unik_info:setColor(0,255,0,150) unik_info:setFontSize(11)
